actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act so as to designate the Box Canyon Creek, Idaho, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Designates the Box Canyon Creek, Idaho, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. Authorizes appropriations of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act so as to designate the Box Canyon Creek, Idaho, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
